amendment.description: To improve the report on the strategy to protect United States national security interests in the Arctic region.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1781 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1781 proposed by Senator Reed for Senator Heitkamp to Amendment SA 1463. (consideration: CR S3912-3915; text: CR S3915) To improve the report on the strategy to protect United States national security interests in the Arctic region.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1781 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1781 proposed by Senator Reed for Senator Heitkamp to Amendment SA 1463.
